HomePage.title: Eleven Flowers Studio - Perfect gifts for you
HomePage.description: In our floral studio, we believe in creating stunning floral compositions that tell a story.

HeroSection.heroSubtitle: In our floral studio, we believe in creating stunning floral compositions that tell a story.

freeShipping.title: Free Shipping
freeShipping.description: Enjoy free delivery for orders over 350 PLN.

discounts.title: Discounts up to 30%
discounts.description: Discounts for loyal customers and on purchases over 350 PLN.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.description: Elegant vases and other gifts to match the flowers.

personalizedService.title: Personalized Approach
personalizedService.description: We create compositions tailored to your wishes and expectations.

freshnessGuarantee.title: Freshness Guarantee
freshnessGuarantee.description: Only the freshest flowers from trusted suppliers.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: We deliver flowers on time so the joy arrives at the perfect moment.

projectPhotos.title: Project Photos
projectPhotos.description: Professional photographs of flowers, gift arrangements, and photography services.

CollectionsSection.title: Discover Our Unique Floral Services
CollectionsSection.subtitle: At our floral studio, we fulfill your flower dreams. Discover our exquisite arrangements, personalized gift boxes, and professional photography services.
